java/liquibase/database/structure/Index.java

00001 package liquibase.database.structure;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00004 
00005 import java.util.ArrayList;
00006 import java.util.List;
00007 
00008 public class Index implements DatabaseObject, Comparable<Index> {
00009     private String name;
00010     private Table table;
00011     private Boolean unique;
00012     private List<String> columns = new ArrayList<String>();
00013     private String filterCondition;
00014 
00015 
00016     public String getName() {
00017         return name;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public void setName(String name) {
00021         this.name = name;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public Table getTable() {
00025         return table;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public void setTable(Table table) {
00029         this.table = table;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public List<String> getColumns() {
00033         return columns;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getColumnNames() {
00037         return StringUtils.join(columns, ", ");
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getFilterCondition() {
00041         return filterCondition;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setFilterCondition(String filterCondition) {
00045         this.filterCondition = filterCondition;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void setUnique(Boolean value) {
00049         this.unique = value;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public Boolean isUnique() {
00053         return this.unique;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00057         if (this == o) return true;
00058         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00059 
00060         Index index = (Index) o;
00061         boolean equals = true;
00062         for (String column : index.getColumns()) {
00063             if (!columns.contains(column)) {
00064                 equals = false;
00065             }
00066         }
00067         if (this.unique == null && index.isUnique() != null) {
00068             equals = false;
00069         } else if (!this.unique.equals(index.isUnique())) {
00070             equals = false;
00071         }
00072 
00073         return equals || table.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(index.table.getName());
00074 
00075     }
00076 
00077     public int hashCode() {
00078         int result;
00079         result = table.getName().toUpperCase().hashCode();
00080         result = 31 * result + columns.hashCode();
00081         result = 31 * result + (unique == null || unique ? 1 : 0);
00082         return result;
00083     }
00084 
00085     public int compareTo(Index o) {
00086         int returnValue = this.table.getName().compareTo(o.table.getName());
00087 
00088         if (returnValue == 0) {
00089             returnValue = this.getName().compareTo(o.getName());
00090         }
00091 
00092         //We should not have two indexes that have the same name and tablename
00093         /*if (returnValue == 0) {
00094                 returnValue = this.getColumnName().compareTo(o.getColumnName());
00095         }*/
00096 
00097 
00098         return returnValue;
00099     }
00100 
00101     public String toString() {
00102         StringBuffer stringBuffer = new StringBuffer();
00103         stringBuffer.append(getName());
00104         if (!this.unique) {
00105             stringBuffer.append(" unique ");
00106         }
00107         stringBuffer.append(" on ").append(table.getName()).append("(");
00108         for (String column : columns) {
00109             stringBuffer.append(column).append(", ");
00110         }
00111         stringBuffer.delete(stringBuffer.length() - 2, stringBuffer.length());
00112         stringBuffer.append(")");
00113         return stringBuffer.toString();
00114     }
00115 
00116 }
